name: The Mystery of Uku
description:
We’re a group of media students from the Degree Programme of Media in Karelia University of Applied Sciences. We are working on two games, The Mystery of Uku and Solence. 

These games are a part of our 10 cr Game Production course. The students have no prior experience in video game production.

Character design Kanel

 

Kanel is a curious little adventurer who likes to experience new things. Kanel loves to meet new people on his journey around the world. Kanel's heart is pure, and they want to be kind and helpful to everyone. Kanel is also a very quiet person nut still gets easily excited about new things.

Zozozo

Zozozo is a crumpy monster who lives in an old castle with his minions. Sometimes Zozozo feels himself a bit lonely but he still hates almost everyone. Zozozo gets jealous easily and usually wants to be the best at everything. Zozozo is also greedy and lazy. He enjoys eating and loves food. 

Check out our social media!
